meanings.definition: To change the color of something.
meanings.sent1: She recoloured her bedroom walls from blue to pink.
meanings.sent2: The artist recoloured the old painting to make it vibrant again.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally recoloured its fur by rolling in paint.
meanings.sent4: The sunset recoloured the sky with shades of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow recoloured the dull landscape with its bright hues.

meanings.definition: Having been given a new color.
meanings.sent1: The recoloured car stood out among the others in the parking lot.
meanings.sent2: The recoloured flowers added a pop of color to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The recoloured cupcakes looked too pretty to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her recoloured hair made her feel like a brand new person.
meanings.sent5: The recoloured book cover caught the attention of many readers.
